page.title: 13EDUCATION AND CLUBS
page.content: The{schools}are Legh Vale C.P., Carr Mill Junior, Ashurst C.P., St Mary's Blackbrook Primary, Richard Evans Infant and Junior, Grange Valley C.P., Haydock High and St Anselm's High (voluntary catholic). There are{Community Centres}at Chain Lane, Blackbrook Road and the Black House at Carr Mill. There is a youth club near Grange Valley. There are{working mens' clubs}at Haydock Labour Club No.1, West End Road, the Conservative Club on Clipsley Lane and the Ex-Serviceman's Club in Haydock Lane. There is a{cricket club}in Cooper Lane.
